column3: since I had never been ( for shame!) so we stopped in around 6
column4: and decided to take advantage of their happy hour menu.  One of the things I did like was that you could sit anywhere in the place and still take advantage of the HH menu
column5: some places you can only sit here
column6: or only sit there which is annoying
column7: especially if the place is packed.  Immediately greeted and sat
column8: and handed all menus.  Lots of drink options for $5
column14: so good.  More on the happy menu here:
